articles.title: WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange appeals US extradition to European Court of Human Rights - ABC News
articles.description: His lawyers launch a case against Britain in the European Court of Human Rights, which could potentially order the extradition to be blocked.

articles.title: Ecuador seeks to protect unique Galapagos birds from flu - Phys.org
articles.description: Ecuador has put in place a plan to try and protect its unique wild bird species on the Galapagos islands from the H5N1 virus also rampaging through Europe and North America.
articles.content:

articles.title: BBVA, Best Global Bank of the Year, according to The Banker - Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria
articles.description: The British publication, which is part of the Financial Times group, selected the BBVA Group as the Global Bank of the Year. The Banker also recognized BBVA as the Best Bank in Western Europe, Spain, Peru and Colombia.
